When I have #[cfg] inside a macro, does it use the config flags of my crate or of the crate the macro is expanded in?
This code is supposed to check allow_clippy in the memoffset crate, but I am not sure if that actually works (and to my surprise, a quick google search showed no useful results to this question).
I would have hoped the question to be answered here but it is not.
I'm pretty sure it's expanded at the call site so it will use whatever config flags are there.
